import {NavLink} from "react-router-dom"; import React from 'react'; import './StyleHeaderCenter/HeaderCenter.css' const HeaderCenter = (props) => { let header_center_container = React.createRef() let myClick = () => { header_center_container.current.classList.toggle('_active') } let Blure = () => { header_center_container.current.classList.toggle('_active') } let buy let cost = props.item.reduce(function (a, b) { return Math.round(a + b.amount); }, 0); if (props.length != null) { buy = {cost} } else { buy = "" } return (
